content:
George Strait and special guest Clay Walker will perform at 

p.m PERIOD Saturday March  at the ThompsonBoling Arena PERIOD Strait with

eight certified platinum albums and over a dozen certified gold is

definitely a man in the top of his field PERIOD His latest album Easy Come

Easy Go continues his tradition of classic country and strong

songwriting PERIOD

Something of a country Renaissance man Strait doesnt confine himself to

one form of expression PERIOD Besides playing both guitar and piano he is active

in steerroping a member of the Professional Rodeo Cowboys Association

hunting fishing and golf PERIOD

He has also had success in film with the critically acclaimed Pure

Country PERIOD While many musiciantoactor crossovers are instantly

regrettable Straits performance was strong and honest PERIOD Playing a country

singer who gives up the limelight to return home and work on a ranch

Strait was able to handle a horse as well as he handles music PERIOD

Strait began his career in  growing from innovator to standardbearer PERIOD

His simple and clean hatjeansdress shirt look caught on with the

glitzjaded country music fans and helped take the genre refreshingly back

to its roots PERIOD The success of his style is evident not only in his

platinumselling albums but in the two dozen awards he has received over

the past  years PERIOD

Easy Come Easy Go features tunes written by some outstanding

Nashville songwriters PERIOD Dean Dillon and Aaron Barker longtime

collaborators with Strait return with the melancholy  and the tearjerker  On the truly

classic country side the album also features George Jones  and

 which was cowritten by Faron

Young PERIOD

Saturdays show should be a great time for country music fans PERIOD
